application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Front areaMagnolia(M.soulangea) -reduce crown by 25%(1.2m) to suitable growth points -reduce lateral branches to match to allow good separation from house frontageFront area Cherry(Prunus)-light thin in upper crown to allow more air/light through canopy -trim back lateral branches overhanging neighbours garden to shape and tidyRear garden Evergreen Magnolia(M.grandiflora)-reduce crown by 25%(0.75m) to suitable growth points -trim back side growth to match, shape, balance and tidy(RETAIN lower 'screening' branches at rear)Rear garden Cotoneaster(C.fridgidus)-trim back all vertical new growth branches to old canopy line -trim side growth to shape and tidyAll works are for routine maintenance
